product_details.product_description: Felix® as good as beautiful junior are tasty meals with appearance, smell and taste so appetizing that you could have cooked them yourself. Each recipe is made up of quality ingredients and contains tender tapered coated with a succulent jelly that will delight your little kitten at all meals! Chatons need a special diet during the first year of their lives. This is why each recipe is specially designed to meet 100% of the daily needs of your kitten. They contain all the proteins and vitamins your kitten needs to become a happy, mischievous and healthy adult cat, with solid muscles, bones and teeth! Please refer to the recommended daily rations on the packaging. And that's not all ! Felix® as good as Beautiful Junior are available in a wide range of delicious jelly recipes to satisfy the desires of variety of your kitten. They are really as good as they seem! Felix®, so irresistible!

distributor.name: Nestlé Suisse S.A.
distributor.address: (CH) Nestlé Suisse S.A., Nestlé Purina PetCare, CP 352, CH-1800 Vevey

general_information.label: Consumer storage instructions
values: Keep pet food in a cool and dry place.

declarations.feeding_instructions: Feeding guide: Felix Kitten is a complete meal, this means it does not need mixing with any other food. You simply pour it out of the pouch and that’s it. Just follow the feeding guide below with any irresistible flavour of your choice. Each kitten is different, depending on the kitten activity level and body condition, food amounts and/or time allowed to eat may need to be adjusted. Serve at room temperature – always provide clear fresh drinking water for your kitten to drink. Serve your kitten’s food in the same place every mealtime so he doesn’t get confused and don’t disturb him while he’s eating. FELIX Kitten is also suitable for sterilized cats. Feeding guidelines should be adapted to help maintain a lean body. FELIX Kitten is also suitable for pregnant or lactating mothers as they require energy-rich food too to take care of their kittens-to-be. After 12 months, your kitten is now an adult and ready to enjoy the delicious range of Felix Adult.
